verses.verse: After <WH310> these things <WH1697> the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came <WH1961> <WH8804> unto Abram <WH87> in a vision <WH4236>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not, Abram <WH87>: I am thy shield <WH4043>, and thy exceeding <WH3966> great <WH7235> <WH8687> reward <WH7939>.

And Abram <WH87> said <WH559> <WH8799>, YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, what wilt thou give <WH5414> <WH8799> me, seeing I go <WH1980> <WH8802> childless <WH6185>, and the steward <WH1121> <WH4943> of my house <WH1004> is this <WH1931> Eliezer <WH461> of Damascus <WH1834> ?
And Abram <WH87> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, to me thou hast given <WH5414> <WH8804> no <WH3808> seed <WH2233>: and, lo, one born <WH1121> in my house <WH1004> is mine heir <WH3423> <WH8802>.

And, behold, the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This shall not be thine heir <WH3423> <WH8799>; but he that shall come forth <WH3318> <WH8799> out of thine own bowels <WH4578> shall be thine heir <WH3423> <WH8799>.

And he brought him forth <WH3318> <WH8686> abroad <WH2351>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Look <WH5027> <WH8685> now toward heaven <WH8064>, and tell <WH5608> <WH8798> the stars <WH3556>, if thou be able <WH3201> <WH8799> to number <WH5608> <WH8800> them: and he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, So <WH3541> shall thy seed <WH2233> be.
And he believed <WH539> <WH8689> in the YY <WH3068>; and he counted <WH2803> <WH8799> it to him for righteousness <WH6666>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, I am the YY <WH3068> that brought thee out <WH3318> <WH8689> of Ur <WH218> of the Chaldees <WH3778>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> thee this land <WH776> to inherit <WH3423> <WH8800> it.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, whereby <WH4100> shall I know <WH3045> <WH8799> that I shall inherit it <WH3423> <WH8799> ?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> me an heifer <WH5697> of three years old <WH8027> <WH8794>, and a she goat <WH5795> of three years old <WH8027> <WH8794>, and a ram <WH352> of three years old <WH8027> <WH8794>, and a turtledove <WH8449>, and a young pigeon <WH1469>.

And he took <WH3947> <WH8799> unto him all these, and divided <WH1334> <WH8762> them in the midst <WH8432>, and laid <WH5414> <WH8799> each <WH376> piece <WH1335> one against <WH7125> <WH8800> another <WH7453>: but the birds <WH6833> divided <WH1334> <WH8804> he not.
And when the fowls <WH5861> came down <WH3381> <WH8799> upon the carcases <WH6297>, Abram <WH87> drove them away <WH5380> <WH8686>.

And when the sun <WH8121> was going down <WH935> <WH8800>, a deep sleep <WH8639> fell <WH5307> <WH8804> upon Abram <WH87>; and, lo, an horror <WH367> of great <WH1419> darkness <WH2825> fell <WH5307> <WH8802> upon him.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Abram <WH87>, Know <WH3045> <WH8799> of a surety <WH3045> <WH8800> that thy seed <WH2233> shall be a stranger <WH1616> in a land <WH776> that is not theirs, and shall serve <WH5647> <WH8804> them; and they shall afflict <WH6031> <WH8765> them four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141>;

And also that nation <WH1471>, whom they shall serve <WH5647> <WH8799>, will I judge <WH1777> <WH8802>: and afterward <WH310> <WH3651> shall they come out <WH3318> <WH8799> with great <WH1419> substance <WH7399>.
And thou shalt go <WH935> <WH8799> to thy fathers <WH1> in peace <WH7965>; thou shalt be buried <WH6912> <WH8735> in a good <WH2896> old age <WH7872>.
But in the fourth <WH7243> generation <WH1755> they shall come hither <WH2008> again <WH7725> <WH8799>: for the iniquity <WH5771> of the Amorites <WH567> is not yet <WH2008> full <WH8003>.

And it came to pass, that, when the sun <WH8121> went down <WH935> <WH8804>, and it was dark <WH5939>, behold a smoking <WH6227> furnace <WH8574>, and a burning <WH784> Menorah <WH3940> that passed <WH5674> <WH8804> between <WH996> those pieces <WH1506>.

In the same <WH1931> day <WH3117> the YY <WH3068> made <WH3772> <WH8804> a covenant <WH1285> with Abram <WH87>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Unto thy seed <WH2233> have I given <WH5414> <WH8804> this land <WH776>, from the river <WH5104> of Egypt <WH4714> unto the great <WH1419> river <WH5104>, the river <WH5104> Euphrates <WH6578>:
The Kenites <WH7017>, and the Kenizzites <WH7074>, and the Kadmonites <WH6935>,
And the Hittites <WH2850>, and the Perizzites <WH6522>, and the Refa'ims <WH7497>,
And the Amorites <WH567>, and the Kanahanites <WH3669>, and the Girgashites <WH1622>, and the Y'vusis <WH2983>.
